name: Claustrophobia (Airnean)
description:
Claustrophobia is a game made for the Epic MegaJam 2021 in a week on the theme of Running Out Of Space!

It's my first solo dev project that I've seen through to completion and I'm super happy with how it's come out so far.

In claustrophobia you try to solve puzzles in shrinking rooms of ever growing complexity with clues along the way as to why you're here, and who made all of these puzzles...

Currently the game consists of 10 levels, though more may be planned for after the jam depending on reception.

If you want to chat to me about the game, it's development, or speedrunning it (there's already a couple speedrunners out there!) come and join the discord:

https://discord.gg/rDAcFpF

WR for current version (0.5)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vuN2-n0v6LA&ab_channel=ShaunHowes
